text: Wintersmith is a fantasy novel by Terry Pratchett and the third Discworld book to have Tiffany Aching as the protagonist. In it the Discworldâ€™s spirit of winter falls in love with Tiffany and curses the Discworld with everlasting winter to get her to love him. Category:Books by Terry Pratchett Category:2006 books
title: Wintersmith
